sn4.1:1.6: Sādhu vatamhi mutto bodhiṃ samajjhagan”ti → sādhu ṭhito sato bodhiṃ samajjhaganti (bj, pts1-2) | sādhu vatamhi satto bodhisamajjhagūti (s1-3, km)
sn4.1:3.4: suddhimaggā aparaddho → suddhimaggamaparaddho (bj, pts1-2) | suddhimaggaṃ aparaddho (s1-3, km)
sn4.1:5.2: amaraṃ tapaṃ → aparaṃ tapaṃ (s1-3, pts1-2, mr)
